Hello.

Thank you Malte, Kent, C=E9dric and Mark for all you clear, interes=
ting and friendly replies.

According to what I've read, TestNG has _the_ t=
wo missing features (among other):
 * Dependencies
 * Parameter

I'm now lo=
oking closely at TestNG, since it seems more suitable for our needs. In fac=
t, I would already have adopted TestNG if I was sure it is compatible with =
the project's environment:
 * Maven 1.0.2
 * Selenium (latest)
 * Hudson (1=
.349)

Because we test a workflow step by step, almost every test will be d=
ependent of the preceding test. Something like:
[test step 1] --> [test ste=
p 2] --> [test step 3] and so on...

AND we will be able to test several wo=
rkflow branches in parallel, that's interesting.

I will say "Thank you Ced=
ric for creating TestNG" :)

Yves
